title: How to survive in Staten Island - Quora

response.answer_text: Staten Island has a bad image.. not sure why, it’s actually a great place to live.. born and raised there and living out of state for 30 years.. I still love it!! Drive around you’d be surprised.. a little suburban a little urban .. great people !
As you would in any other place. Find a place to live that works in terms of you life activities. Locate the merchants that you will rely on, and settle into the routine of daily living.
